channel.title: SUDAO-IP-8: Transfer 5,500 KPI Options to the Operations Team Multi-sig (EXPEDITED)(PASSED)
channel.link:
.. **SUDAO-IP-8: Transfer 5,500 KPI Options to the Operations Team Multi-sig** I want to run this proposal under the expedited governance track defined in [SUDAO-IP-2.1](.. **Executive Summary:** This is a proposal to request funding of 5,500 KPI Options from the DAO treasury to the Operations Team Multi-sig. These options are collateralized with $UMA tokens with a base value of 0 $UMA and a maximum value of 0.6 $UMA per KPI option at expiry 03/31/22. These options gain value per integration achieved during this epoch. For more information please check [here](.. A total of 5,500 KPI options are being requested. 4,500 KPI options will be distributed to all 9 teams within the SuperUMAn DAO (500 each) to be used for tipping on discord through tip.cc 1,000 KPI options will be sent to the Operations team to be used as prizes for events during our end of epoch party. **DAO Balance & Specifications:** 75,000 KPI Options have been minted and distributed as ratified in [SUDAO-IP-3](.. 49,550 KPI Options have been distributed to DAO members as KPI Options compensation as ratified in SUDAO-IP-3. 17,500 KPI Options have been distributed to each team’s multi-sig as team based compensation distribution. The DAO currently holds 7,950 KPI Options that have not been budgeted. If this vote passes, 5,500 KPI Options will be distributed to the Operations Team Multi-sig and DAO balance of KPI Options will be 2,450. **Voting Timeline under Expedited Governance Rules** Discourse Vote - 48hrs Snapshot Vote - 48hrs [poll type=multiple results=always min=1 max=1 public=true chartType=bar groups=Superumans,Umasters close=2022-03-18T14:30:00.000Z] * Yes * More Discussions Needed * No [/poll] Thu, 17 Mar 2022 21:36:52 +0000 Formal Proposal SUDAO-IP-8: Transfer 5,500 KPI Options to the Operations Team Multi-sig (EXPEDITED)(PASSED) FruityCup

hahah, appreciate it Poopster.

Thank you!

well done my fren. gonna start calling you the governator

First expedited governance proposal !!

Time to get ready to party

SUDAO-IP-8: Transfer 5,500 KPI Options to the Operations Team Multi-sig

4,500 KPI options will be distributed to all 9 teams within the SuperUMAn DAO (500 each) to be used for tipping on discord through tip.cc

1,000 KPI options will be sent to the Operations team to be used as prizes for events during our end of epoch party.
